description: This file defines asynchronous functions to fetch run steps and attachments from a database using SQLAlchemy ORM models, specifically related to 'logs' or 'run' data.

methods.name: List[models.RunStep] get_run_steps(db: AsyncSession, run_id: int)
methods.description: Fetches all run steps for a specific run ID asynchronously.

methods.name: List[models.Attachment] get_run_attachments(db: AsyncSession, run_id: int)
methods.description: Fetches all attachments associated with a specific run ID asynchronously.

ctags.name: get_run_attachments
ctags.pattern: /^async def get_run_attachments(db: AsyncSession, run_id: int) -> List[models.Attachment]:$/

ctags.name: get_run_steps
ctags.pattern: /^async def get_run_steps(db: AsyncSession, run_id: int) -> List[models.RunStep]:$/
